description: Manage Azure API Management GraphQL API's Resolvers.

commands.name: az apim graphql resolver create
commands.summary: Create a new resolver in the GraphQL API or updates an existing one.
examples: az apim graphql resolver create --service-name MyApim -g MyResourceGroup --api-id MyApi --resolver-id MyResolverId --display-name "Query-allFamilies" --path "Query/allFamilies" --description "A GraphQL Resolver example"

commands.name: az apim graphql resolver delete
commands.summary: Delete the specified resolver in the GraphQL API.
examples: az apim graphql resolver delete --service-name MyApim -g MyResourceGroup --api-id MyApi --resolver-id MyResolverId

commands.name: az apim graphql resolver list
commands.summary: List a collection of the resolvers for the specified GraphQL API.
examples: az apim graphql resolver list --service-name MyApim -g MyResourceGroup --api-id MyApi

commands.name: az apim graphql resolver show
commands.summary: Get the details of the GraphQL API Resolver specified by its identifier.
examples: az apim graphql resolver show --service-name MyApim -g MyResourceGroup --api-id MyApi --resolver-id MyResolverId
